text: Melchor López (born 7 January 1913, date of death unknown) is an Argentine former sports shooter. He competed at the 1960 Summer Olympics and the 1964 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1913 births Category:Year of death missing Category:Argentine male sport shooters Category:Olympic shooters of Argentina Category:Shooters at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:Shooters at the 1964 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Buenos Aires
title: Melchor López
